ascend_skill.desc:
Every 3 ally actions, inflict Insight on the foe with the most Down Points. When attacking a foe with Insight, spend its Insight stacks to grant Riko Intel.
Insight: Increase next damage taken by 6%. When attacking, Riko gains 2 Intel stacks. When dealing weakness or normal affinity damage, decrease Down Points by 1. When decreasing Down Points, gain 1 more Intel stack. Intel stacks up to 8 times.
ascend_skill.name: Snowfall Fragrance

ascend_skill.desc: At the start of battle, inflict Insight on the foe with the most Down Points.
ascend_skill.name: Spring Squall

ascend_skill.desc: After using Verngale Petals, inflict Insight on the foe with the most Down Points.
ascend_skill.name: Ethereal Scent

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Scattered Plum Blossoms and Dreams in the Mist by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Harmonious Fragrance

ascend_skill.desc: When an ally uses a Highlight, inflict Insight on the foe with the most Down Points.
ascend_skill.name: One Thousand Blossoms

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill level of Verngale Petals by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Balance and Harmony

ascend_skill.desc: If Riko's Speed is 100 or more, when using Verngale Petals, decrease cooldown time for every 15 points of Speed over 100, up to 4 actions.
ascend_skill.name: Majesty

normal_skill.desc:
Decrease all foes' Defense by 10.0%/10.0%/11.2%/11.2% for 2 turns.
When Riko's Speed is at 100 or more, decrease Defense by 4.9% for every 10 points of Speed over 100, up to 29.4%/32.3%/32.9%/35.9%.
Also inflict Insight on the main target.
Cooldown Time: 4 ally actions.
normal_skill.name: Scattered Plum Blossoms

normal_skill.desc:
Increase all foes' damage taken by 10.5%/11.6%/11.8%/12.8% for 2 turns.
When an ally lowers a foe's Down Points or knocks down a foe, decrease cooldown time by 1. When cooldown time reaches 0, activate this skill.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions.
normal_skill.name: Dreams in the Mist

normal_skill.desc:
Spend all Intel stacks to grant Fair Winds to party for 1 turn and restore targeted ally's HP by 12.7%/12.7%/14.2%/14.2%.
Fair Winds: Increase damage to foes by 12.6%/13.9%/14.1%/15.4%. Increase more based on Riko's Speed and the number of Intel stacks spent. If Riko's Speed is at 100 or more, increase damage by 1.05% for every 10 points of Speed over 100, up to 6.3%/6.9%/7.1%/7.7%.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions. (Cannot be used when Intel is less than 5.)
normal_skill.name: Verngale Petals

passive_skill.desc:
At the start of battle, if Riko's Speed is 100 or more, increase party's HP by 6, Attack by 2, and Defense by 2 for every 1 point of Speed above 100.
Increase HP up to 360, Attack up to 120, and Defense up to 120.
passive_skill.name: Springtime Tempest

passive_skill.desc: Increase 1 More and All-Out Attack damage by 60.0%.
passive_skill.name: Plum Blossom Glory
